page.title: 15TRANSPORT
page.content: THE MAIN FORM OF MASS TRANSPORT IS BY CAR THERE IS ONLY ONE BUS A DAY NO OTHER PUBLIC TRANSPORT HOWEVER SCHOOL BUSES RUN TO AND FROM THE SCHOOLS AND THESE TAKE PASSENGERS IF THERE IS ROOM. . OTHER MODES OF TRANSPORT ARE. LORRY/ M/BIKE/TRACTOR. THE ROAD FROM N.TAWTON TO THE B3220 NORTH OF WINKLEIGH HAS JUST BEEN WIDENED TO MOST PEOPLE THIS IS AN IMPROVEMENT.HOWEVER THE ROAD HAS NOT BEEN COMPLETED IT STOPS JUST SOUTH OF WINKLIEGH.THREE ALTERNATIVE ROUTES ARE PROPOSED 1ST STRAGHT THROUGH THE VILLAGE 2ND EAST AROUND THE SOUTHERN TIP OF WINKLEIGH TO JOIN THE B322O. 3RD WEST MISSING WINKLEIGH TO JOIN THE B3220 WEST OF WINKLEIGH . THESE THREE ROUTES ARE STILL CAUSING ARGUMENTS.
